meanings.definition: The quality or state of being dull, boring, or lacking in brightness or interest.
meanings.sent1: The drabnesses of the room made it hard to stay awake during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The artist used vibrant colors to combat the drabnesses of the painting.
meanings.sent3: Despite the drabnesses of the situation, they found a way to make each other laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her personality shone brightly, dispelling the drabnesses that surrounded her.
meanings.sent5: The drabnesses of the winter landscape were suddenly transformed by a rainbow.

meanings.definition: The dullness or lack of color in something.
meanings.sent1: The drabnesses of the old photograph made it hard to distinguish the details.
meanings.sent2: She added a pop of color to the room to break up the drabnesses of the walls.
meanings.sent3: The drabnesses of the outfit were unintentional, but she still rocked it with confidence.
meanings.sent4: The drabnesses of the sky were a stark contrast to the vibrant flowers below.
meanings.sent5: The drabnesses of the cityscape were suddenly illuminated by a burst of fireworks.
